response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its high-quality features and the effort put into its development, we believe its value extends beyond $150. Considering this, I propose a special introductory offer of $120 for you today. This is a fantastic opportunity to own a product that truly stands out in its category. I look forward to your consideration and the chance to serve you.", "product_price": 120}
